titleStmt.title: A helpe to the right understanding of a discourse concerning independency. Lately published by William Pryn of Lincolnes Inne, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Walwyn by Wing.
Wing has publication year 1644 only; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645; McMichael and Taft, The writings of William Walwyn, p.131, give 1644/5.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
